meanings.definition: A type of virus that can cause respiratory, gastrointestinal, and eye infections in humans.
meanings.sent1: The adenovirus spread quickly through the school, causing many students to get sick.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying how adenoviruses affect different parts of the body.
meanings.sent3: The adenovirus decided to take a vacation in the lungs, but it wasn't a very relaxing trip.
meanings.sent4: The adenovirus was like a tiny invader, attacking the body's defenses.
meanings.sent5: The adenovirus was a sneaky troublemaker, lurking in unsuspecting hosts.
